ygData.subject: Re: Medium sized cloth armor in Freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe I bought mine in North Freeport.  Don t those gnomes sell Medium cloth at the Marketplace?  Little blue building with a forge outside it for some odd
ygData.messageBody:
I believe I bought mine in North Freeport. Don't those gnomes sell Medium
cloth at the Marketplace? Little blue building with a forge outside it for
some odd reason.

> As the title says, is there anywhere in FP to purchase medium sized cloth
> armor? You would think being a human town there is, but so far all I can
> find is 2 pieces for sale in North Ro.


--
Destine "Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult
Bret Guillet to drive; easy to govern but impossible to enslave."
destine@... - Lord Brougham
